ThingDef.Name: StuffedAnimalBase
ThingDef.label: stuffed animal
ThingDef.description: A stuffed animal.

ThingDef.label: orbital trade beacon
ThingDef.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.

ThingDef.label: comms console
ThingDef.description: Allows radio contact with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.

ThingDef.label: firefoam popper
ThingDef.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.

ThingDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?

ThingDef.label: multi-analyzer
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near hi-tech research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.

ThingDef.label: vitals monitor
ThingDef.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.

ThingDef.label: tool cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.

ThingDef.label: Cooking tools
ThingDef.description: Will boost the cooking speed of all cooking work benches nearby by 15%.

ThingDef.label: firefoam popper
ThingDef.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.

ThingDef.label: marriage spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.

ThingDef.label: party spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.

ThingDef.label: snowman
ThingDef.description: A set of large snowballs piled and shaped to resemble a person.

ThingDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?

ThingDef.label: Mysterious Artefact
ThingDef.description: This is an object of an ancient civilisation. What might happen, if you activate it?

ThingDef.label: spores
ThingDef.Description: Building used to spawn gleamcap spores.

ThingDef.label: Autopsy table
ThingDef.Description: Doctors hone their skills by testing their techniques on corpses.

ThingDef.label: shooting target
ThingDef.description: The shooting range is a place where you can train your hand-eye coordination.

ThingDef.label: martial arts target
ThingDef.description: The martial arts dummy is a place where you can train your martial arts, with or without a weapon.

ThingDef.Label: mobile mineral sonar
ThingDef.Description: The mobile mineral sonar is used to detect hidden metallic objects in the heart of big mountains. - It will slowly scan the surrounding rocks autonomously with its embedded battery. - Supplying some additional power will speed up the scan rate.

ThingDef.label: Charging energy pack
ThingDef.description: Charging energy pack. It will be usable once fully charged.

ThingDef.label: terraforming pump
ThingDef.description: Slowly expands a field of growable soil around itself. Needs Power: 1000W

ThingDef.label: fissure
ThingDef.description: A fissure that cuts deep into the earth.

ThingDef.label: fissure generator
ThingDef.description: A powerful machine designed to crack open the earth and create a deep fissure which can be used to can access to the lower layers of the planet's crust.

ThingDef.label: ore extractor
ThingDef.description: This machine digs deep into the ground and extracts metals from the earth.

ThingDef.label: dermal regenerator
ThingDef.description: A medical device able to scan and repair surface tissue.
